        userId - The Id of a user

      • forgotPasswordRequest

        public void forgotPasswordRequest(APICredentials credentials)
                           throws DataAccessException
        This will be called when the user has forgotten his password and asked to start the reset procedure.
        Parameters:
        credentials - A credentials object containing the email of a user
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - This is thrown when the password can't be reset.

      • forgotPasswordResponse

        public boolean forgotPasswordResponse(String token,
                                      APICredentials credentials)
        This will be called when the user has forgotten his password and has received a mail to finish the reset procedure.
        Parameters:
        token - The unique token
        credentials - The new credentials of the user
        Returns:
        Whether the procedure was successful or not
